data.title: Cognetas Said to Weigh $700 Million Sale of Franceâ€™s Tokheim
data.meta_description: Cognetas LLP, the U.K. buyout firm that split from Electra Partners LLP in 2005, is exploring a sale of Tokheim SAS that may fetch as much as 500 million euros ($706 million), said three people with knowledge of the matter.
data.text:
Cognetas LLP, the U.K. buyout firm that split from Electra Partners LLP in 2005, is exploring a sale of Tokheim SAS that may fetch as much as 500 million euros ($706 million), said three people with knowledge of the matter.

Cognetas hired JPMorgan Chase & Co . to manage a deal for the Paris-based maker of gas-station equipment, said the people, who declined to be identified as the process is private. The London-based buyout firm has a meeting with banks over financing this week, one of them said.
